wblut.hemesh.creators
Class HEMC_VoronoiCells

java.lang.Object
  wblut.hemesh.creators.HEMC_MultiCreator
      wblut.hemesh.creators.HEMC_VoronoiCells

public class HEMC_VoronoiCells
extends HEMC_MultiCreator

Creates the Voronoi cells of a collection of points, constrained by a mesh.

Author:
Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
